abstract: The chart-topping singer has been plagued by vocal problems much of the year.
snippet: The chart-topping singer has been plagued by vocal problems much of the year.
lead_paragraph: Adele, the British soul singer who has dominated the music charts in the United States and Britain all year with her album "21" (XL/Columbia), will undergo surgery to repair her vocal cords and has canceled her scheduled concerts for the rest of the year, Columbia Records announced.

headline.main: Adele to Have Surgery on Vocal Cords
